ratings.comment: Although he needs to improve his lectures, his notes are fine because they include all the important information in the course. He doesn't give hard assessments, but we can still learn something.

Nimal is the best instructor you can get so far for STAT 310 since others are HELL LEVEL HARD. His lectures are boring but the notes are pretty organized. Tests are fair, and he provides extra credit throughout the semester. Not very accessible through email though.

To be honest, one of the most boring lecturers that I've ever had. His notes are not very organized, on a word doc and not formatted well. I stopped going to the lectures halfway through the semester as did most people because you can learn better just reading the textbook. That being said, the exams are fair and he's very lenient on the grading.
Incoherent, unorganized, and overall just not the best at teaching. Couldn't understand anything that came out of his mouth.
prof is useless. was able to get by with his notes tho

It's hard to follow anything Nimal is doing. During lectures, he scrolls back and forth through his notes making it difficult to understand anything going on. He also spends a lot of time explaining topics that have no relation to whatever we are discussing. With no lecture flow and quick pacing, it's easy to get confused in his lectures.

Nimal is a nice professor who seems like he cares about his students. However, his lectures are extremely hard to follow. If you want an easy grade, Nimal is the way to go, but there is little to no knowledge that is gained from his classes. If you are taking this course to develop fundamental skills, I highly recommend to not take this professor.

I had to learn all the content on my own even though I went to lecture. It is nice he allows notes on exams but I am convinced if we couldn't everyone would fail his class. He is a nice person but one of the worst teachers I've ever had regarding explaining content.

He is so nice. Nimal offered notes for every class and his notes are pretty clear. For the exam, offering practice exam and you can bring as much as possible notes, you even can bring textbook. His hw and exam are easy. You can learn a lot from his lecture. Definitely taking his class again.
